website_summaries.verdict: Despite its no-frills appearance, this premium car seat has an innovative design that delivers superb comfort, welcome relief from back pain, and exceptional durability.
pros: Angled design promotes correct posture and reduces pressure on the lower spine
Partial coccyx cutout maintains structural integrity while doing a great job of nixing tailbone pain and relieving sciatica
3 layered construction offers an unrivaled balance of breathability, plush comfort, and firm support
Durable and maintains its shape far longer than most
cons: We’d prefer a slightly more modern design, but given the quality, we’ll happily overlook appearance

customer_reviews.title: More pricey than others, but worth  it for the quality, memory foam, removable cover, and the strap to hold it in place.
customer_reviews.text: I waited a couple of weeks before submitting the review. Thick memory foam. Fit Prius just fine, and Prius has "wings" on the side of the front seats. The belt wraps around the back of the seat just fine. Seat cushion stays in place while driving. Comfotable boost for smaller driver . Taller drivers might hit their head on the roof liner of the car since the cushion raises up the driver. Has zipped cover so it can be removed, washed, and put back onto the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: MikeF

customer_reviews.title: Car Seat Cushion with Strap by Clever Yellow.
customer_reviews.text: I must say that I wish I had bought this a year or more ago, it is the best thing I could have spent my money on. I have an older car and am short, this fills in the dip in my seat so that I sit level in the car and it really helps my back because I have some back problems as well, and it raises me up so that I can see better. And the material that it is made of makes getting in and out of the car so much easier because of the texture. I
customer_reviews.author: Jean Hagen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderfully comfortable, soft but sturdy cushion
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! I recently got a new car which proved to have a seat that could not be adjusted to a comfortable position. Since car manufacturers seem to think we all want to sit in a deep pit with our knees higher than our behinds, a cushion like this to flatten the seat is vital. Makes my long commute comfortable....and I won't have to trade the car in after all! The cushion is soft, but is firm enough to keep its shape. I've had mine over 3 months now and it has not compressed at all. The strap holding it in place is very helpful too. I definitely recommend this. I'm not planning to ever drive without it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I have been using it now for about 7 days and am very pleased with the results
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure this cushion would work and alleviate the pain I was having due to my L4 but I have to admit - it works. I still have the sensation that there is something not aligned correctly, but I have no more pain since using this cushion. I have been using it now for about 7 days and am very pleased with the results. Worth the money. I am recommending it to a co-worker who has a similar problem.
customer_reviews.author: Trudy

customer_reviews.title: He was pleased at first with this cushion but after just three ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband drives a propane truck for a living and has posture and pain issues. He was pleased at first with this cushion but after just three weeks of daily use the cushion has compressed on the side he gets in and out on. So now its lopsided. The cushion is advertised as "able to hold its shape" However this is not true. Just FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for me!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to increase my comfort during a seven hour drive in my Toyota Prius...mission accomplished! I am recovering from a ruptured disc in my neck, so long drives are tough for me. In general, my frugal temperment resists thoughts of pampering myself. Then I recall the MONTHS of agony and staggering costs of MRIs, doctor visits, meds, and physical therapy...and conclude that anything that helps me to lead a healthy, functional life is worth it! If you don't have your health, you don't have anything, so take good care of yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Jen & Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & firm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Clever car seat cushion because I needed additional height. At 3” it is the perfect boost to raise my line of sight for better & safer driving. The material is firm but comfortable. I’ve had it for several weeks and drive every day, and it hasn’t flattened like the cushions I used before. It seems durable and sturdy. Perfect color for my silver grey car. I am glad to know that it is a family-owned business.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Solid product that helped me tremendously
customer_reviews.text: Seriously saved back. The cushioning is dead on. I drive a 2010 RX350 and someone who owner the car before me wore the seat out pretty badly. Driving the truck over an hour and a half to work each way (new) resulted in debilitating pain down my leg for two weeks. 3 days of using it and the pain is gone. I may have liked it a touch more if it covered more of the seat as it does not run the entire length of the seat - but it's fine. Well made product and I'd imagine worth the few extra dollars over the competitors. No lie and I wasn't paid for the review.
customer_reviews.author: Dave F

customer_reviews.title: A miracle !
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2016 Subaru Crosstrek. The car is great, but on road trips, the drivers seat and the passenger seat becomes very uncomfortable. When driving, I would get cramping in my legs and pain from my hip to my drivers foot. This seat is amazing! I just drove on vacation, a 5 hour trip using the seat. I had NO pain! I will continue to use these seats. Very, very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Henneman

customer_reviews.title: Better support.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be well made and comfortable! Only 2 complaints is it puts me to high up in my seat I actually have to raise the steering wheel to get in and out of my car (my seats are fixed will not raise or lower). Also I do wish it was a little bit wider, it does not cover the whole seat and I have to reposition myself every time I get in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: It is a good firm support
customer_reviews.text: Having had a total right hip replacement along with the combined fact that my right knee does not bend at all, but is completely straight, this cushion gives me the height under my hip without flatting out. It is a good firm support, yet very comfortable. The strap is an awesome bonus. Attached as instructed to the car seat it keeps it in place . I would greatly recommend this cushion to anyone that has a problem such as I have stated or, that needs some extra height that tapers down to the front edge of the seat. Awesome cushion and I plan to order another go in our other car.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy wynn

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product---Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this cushion--as it is a wedge, it supports my buttocks and supports my thighs as it provides a level seat in our Ford Fusion car seat. The seat is a severe slope which places the passenger in a bucket and the cushion provides the level seat, diminishing the pain in the pain pelvic and leg area. Highly recommend this product--I can enjoy road trips again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect cushion.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th cushion of diff. kind, but this is by far the best one for my car as it’s near perfectly sized (if only it’s a bit deeper or longer towards the front of my seat), thickness is perfect & is supportive of my lumbar. Thankfully, it came in perfect timing before my first long trip, couldn’t have endured w/out it. What would make it perfect is if they add a 1/2” gel layer on top for comfort & cooling. Then, I’ll buy a 2nd one to replace it & use my current one in my home. But for now, it’s the only one out there that will support my back for long drive.
customer_reviews.author: T. Le

customer_reviews.title: Prevents leg pain, strap keeps it in place
customer_reviews.text: Both my wife and I get siatica (pain in back of leg) when driving. The bucket seats in our Subaru Crostrek and Ford F-150 put us in a position that irritates the sciatic nerve if we drive for more that anout 20 mins. We both have tested this product and found it to prevent that pain, even on hours-long trips. We have used it for two weeks now. I particularly like the durable surface material and the stap on the back which secures it to the seat. I am now purchasing a second one because my wife has claimed the first one. 😄
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Langston

customer_reviews.title: My Honest Experience
customer_reviews.text: I get soreness when driving long length of time Perhaps very tight hamstrings or IT band. I pruchsed this in hopes of being able to drive hr plus. I made the purchase after reading the other review. Sorry to say, this DIDN'T work for me. It makes me sit much higher. Close to ceiling of car. Makes it hard to see properly. Then there was no relief. I'm using it at my desk now instead. Even for that I get soreness after a few hrs. I am doing stretches and strengthening to alleviate my condition though. Next idea is a self driving car !
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe Living In America

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a new Tacoma and hated the seats. Looked for product like this and to my surprise, when ordered and it came in, it actually performed as described. I needed a little height lift instead of sink down into Toyota's version of a bucket seat and it works great. Give me the lift and comfort I need for long drives and short runs both! Thanks for making a fantastic product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Morganti

customer_reviews.title: It Does What It Says It Will Do
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is well designed ergonomically. Using it, I sit more upright in my car seat, with better posture and better back support. It's surprisingly comfortable after taking a minute or two to adjust to the new sitting position. I'm in a middle-aged Prius, so the original seats have lost a lot of their support capacity. This auto seat cushion restores the original seating comfort level, with more back support as it subtly alters my posture to straighten my back and make me sit more upright. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Although I know better, this pillow feels like sitting on compressed cardboard! I have had other car pillows that were more comfortable but that soon compressed and became unusable because they were too soft and lost density. I know this pillow will remain firm because there is not a bit of give to it. It SHOULD have been molded rather than a firm straight pillow, then it would have been comfortable even firm. I will keep using it for now to give it enough time for me to get used to it... but I am not sure I will keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Was only thick for several days
customer_reviews.text: It's advertised as "exclusive NO flatten", but it flattened out to a very thin cushion n a few days. Perhaps there's a way to correct it, but right now it's useless to me, it's a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: S E

customer_reviews.title: If only it were deeper (or as deep as they say)!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought SO MANY car seats, and I thought I'd found the right one at last. But the measurement front to back is too short. It's hard to tell from the description and schematic exactly how deep it is. I thought it would be 16" but it's not. It appears to be well constructed, and the 3-layer feature would be the most comfortable arrangement I'd found--but it's just not deep enough. I have a Honda Ridgeline, and this leaves most of my thighs with no support. Pity. I have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes, it will raise you in your seat, ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it will raise you in your seat, but just adjust your seat...no problem. From the moment I sat on it, I could only think why didn't I know about this? So far I've only been on short trips, but on a 10-hour drive next month, I am confident it will make a huge difference in how my backside feels. I also plan to take it into meetings where the chairs are sheer torture. I've had SI joint problems, and this will help. Just hoping it'll stand up to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa 1818

customer_reviews.title: More firm than soft vehicle booster seat cushion.
customer_reviews.text: If my actual car seat was made of this material It would work. This cushion didn't work for me unfortunately and was returned. If you're a tall individual your height will be raised to the point you're uncomfortable and possibly not even able to drive. This cushion would be perfect for a shorter individual looking for a significant boost that also wants full firm support on the thighs and backside without the sink in effect of typical seat cushions. It's a premium cushion for sure but tall folks will have to keep searching.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: I like that it attaches to the seat
customer_reviews.text: After reading many reviews on different car seat wedges, I purchased this one for my senior citizen mother. She is just under 5' and I thought a little lift might help her. I like that it attaches to the seat. With the good reviews, I decided to take a chance and get this one (even though I thought it was pricier than the others I saw). I'm glad I did because my mom LOVES it! It's perfect for her needs. SO happy I spent the extra $ and went with a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality control problems
customer_reviews.text: Definitely there's a quality control problem. First cushion I got had foam that was cut too big for the case. It folded over in the front, causing an uncomfortable ridge. Exchanged it -- second cushion's case was made of inferior quality material compared to the first, and it also had foam that was too big for the case. This time, I cut the excess foam off with scissors. Was difficult to gauge how much material to cut off. Would be better if the foam is cut consistently the exact right size already. As for comfort -- it is okay. I like that it is big surface area. After a while of sitting on it, it does feel hard.
customer_reviews.author: L.L.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The description says it's not a booster seat, but the 3" wedge definitely makes me feel higher up and have better visibility in my car. I'm very short so was looking for a boost. The tapered wedge makes it very comfortable to blend into the car seat and allows me to reach the pedals comfortably. I don't bother strapping the strap, and it doesn't shift around while in use. I love everything about this seat - firm enough to do its job, soft enough to be comfortable for long rides.
customer_reviews.author: Marcie R

customer_reviews.title: ) Extremely comfortable, extremely helpful for a 5'4" sedan driver who'd ...
customer_reviews.text: Gives an incredible feel of raising you to a higher seating position (incredible b/c it really doesn't measure that thick.) Extremely comfortable, extremely helpful for a 5'4" sedan driver who'd felt like she needed a little more height to be in command of the road.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Might seem hard at first, but give it time.
customer_reviews.text: This was tough to start with, but after 4 or 5 days it molded to me. I am a mailman who has the most uncomfortable seat combined with back problems. It seemed very hard and was expecting something softer, but over time it adapted to me. Give it time. My back feels much better using this seat cushion. The only complaint I have is the stitching is coming loose from the strap that holds it in place. This is due to the fact I get in and out of my vehicle 50-70 times per day. Soon I will need to sew the strap back to the cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe

customer_reviews.title: Unable to use because the lip at narrow part of wedge reduced feet circulation
customer_reviews.text: I initially like this seat wedge...which did indeed alleviate lower back pains which I was having without the wedge in place. The problem was that, after about 4 months of continuous use, I realized that the 1/2-3/4" lip on the narrow edge of the wedge was limiting circulation to the bottom of both feet (because of the slight pressure that that small lip was putting on the bottom of both legs just above my knees). I will no longer be able to use this wedge, and will be looking for another way to elevate the back of my car seat in a way which has a smooth angle and no pressure points on the underside of both legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product has changed big time.... not the original
customer_reviews.text: Love the old version. They must have sourced new materials. The new one is terrible. Doesn't;t even look like this picture. The old one is pictured. Mine was folded in half and damaged. Totally different cover material as well and much thinner than original. DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever happened to my SUV
customer_reviews.text: This seat cushion is the best thing ever happened to my SUV. It helps me sit higher, enjoy better visibility, and driving for hours without that usual coccyx pain. It's very comfortable, and the strap's very handy keeping it in place. Having its own cover is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: Nbaird

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This cushion makes sitting in a car seat for long periods of time doable. The cutout in the seat relieving tailbone pressure is genius! My husband and I both got these cushions. He got his first, but after sitting on it while riding in the car, I purchased my own. My husband would always get a tight hamstring from riding in a car on a long car trip. He drove 900 miles in one day and didn't have any aches or pains.
customer_reviews.author: nunya

customer_reviews.title: Nice option for heavily bolstered seats
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as the Recaro seats in my sports car are heavily bolstered and had pressure point on my thighs. This seat is very well constructed and very comfortable. It worked well to to lift me higher than the leg bolsters easing the pain and pressure points. BUT you need to be aware it does raise your effective seat height. In my case even with my seat in the lowest adjustable position and the pad, my head is just about an inch from touching the interior ceiling and I'm under 6' tall.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Really boosts seating height!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! I really needed the extra height from this car seat as I am a super short person (5 feet). This gives just the right amount of height and doesn't deflate even after I have been sitting on it for so long (hours of driving!). I also love that this product has an adjustable strap and so it never moves and I'm not distracted from my driving. Thank you so much, Clever Yellow. I love your product!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this cushion. Bought for my wife after she broke her tailbone and driving for any extended time was very difficult for her. Now, we take these everywhere we go from 2 hours to up to 17 hours drive (non-stop). These make the trips so much more comfortable. They are still in excellent condition. Material inside and the cover are still like new. Truly one of the best cushions on the market and the price is reasonable considering the comfort you get. I highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Paul Hensler

customer_reviews.title: strap is nice touch!
customer_reviews.text: Other seats no straps so it's always annoyingly out of place if your in and out of the car. this one keeps in place hence eliminating this burden. i used to use the original orthopedic memory foam and the knock-offs look pretty good too and much cheaper- which now I use on my office chair. anyhoot, it's better than the ortho because it's less bulkier with the same effect, I wouldn't say it supports any better. Also, the cover material is perfect, grips butt, car seat and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: C. J. K.

customer_reviews.title: Great cushion!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite cushion so far. As some others have said, it is firm. But it has to have some firmness, otherwise it would just flatten out and it would be the same as no cushion at all. I also like the breathable cover, and the fact that the coccyx cutout doesn’t go all the way through. That keeps it from becoming too wide an opening when you sit on it. Because of of the shape of my car seat, I did have to insert an extra layer of foam right in the middle so it would lay flat, but every car seat is different. I would like a handle, though. Will be buying another for the house.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Spurgeon

customer_reviews.title: This cushion works very well.
customer_reviews.text: It is comfortable, firmer than others I have tried. I like that I can take it inside to use at desk or table as well as in the car. I have taken it to my grandchildren's sports activities to use on the bleacher seats. It is too soon for me to comment on the longevity, i.e. flattening of the foam. I suggest that you buy this one. I know it is not the cheapest, but it is worth a little more money.
customer_reviews.author: Gordy Myers

customer_reviews.title: Product was not good for me
customer_reviews.text: For how expensive it is relative to other similar products, I thought this cushion would provide me better lower back support than the bucket seat itself. But having sat on this cushion for just over a week, ~30 min drives 2x a day, I have found that it is actually worse for my lower back and glutes than not using it. The cushion was not firm enough, seem to not recover its shape quick enough, and didn't provide a big enough wedge. Maybe it's just not right for me. I am hoping to return and get a refund on this product, having contacted the seller directly, but I have not received a response so far.
customer_reviews.author: C.Tsang

customer_reviews.title: Too hard, too small!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for use in my 1 ton truck while towing. Waste of time and money. Terrible for long drive. Cushion is too hard, too small and too short under legs, creates pressure point under thigh. I'm 5' 9" 175lbs so not really that big. Very uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: 333tx

customer_reviews.title: Easing hip discomfort
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a multi-state road trip. This eliminated what would have been an achy drive popping ibuprofen. Coupled this with a full seat back support and i was set. Im slim and in good shape but my hips get achy on car rides. This was a huge help. It does not completely eliminate every twinge since bodies need to move but highly recommend! The material is breathable and not scratchy.
customer_reviews.author: Barb E

customer_reviews.title: BEST Car Cushion EVER !!!
customer_reviews.text: Must have this if you are a 5 feet tall ! It is the best support and height elevation that does not cave or shift while you get in and out of the car
customer_reviews.author: Suzahnna

customer_reviews.title: So happy I found this back saver!
customer_reviews.text: I was having a lot of lower right side back pain which I believe was caused by the seat of a vehicle we recently purchased that I was using for a mail route. Since I have been using this cushion, the pain is gradually improving. I had seen a Dr. and was going to a physical therapist. Neither seemed to be helping. This cushion is correcting the cause of the pain and I am feeling so much better! I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: LIke a Cheap Knock-Off
customer_reviews.text: Upon thorough inspection, it revealed very poor workmanship and materials. The foam had strange stains that looked like grease. It lost it firmness after a short period of sitting time, causing it to bottom out and cancel any useful support. It was made off balance, such that the indentation for the coccyx was laterally uneven, causing a uneven support for both sides. The only aspect of it that was good of good quality was the cover. The strap and buckle only got in the way. I would have to guess that I received a cheap knock off. It would have been great if it had been of good quality and workmanship.
customer_reviews.author: The Bings

customer_reviews.title: Great support for sitting
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It is just enough so that my back is not curved when sitting on my car's seat. It does squish a bit, but not that badly, and it is comfortable. It does have an indentation where your tailbone goes, if you have trouble with that. I think it is worth the cost, for my needs. I have used it already for a few weeks, and consider it very comfortable. I can also take it along with me anywhere, and it works well, whether at the office or in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi KoldenTop Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: I hoped the cushion would have stiffer foam layer. ...
customer_reviews.text: I hoped the cushion would have stiffer foam layer. Maybe I am too heavy for this cushion, but the cushion is way too soft for me. However the shape is correct. I may customize this cushion with a hard layer of material on the bottom side. I have problems with veins in my upper thighs when I sit down. I have even considered double pad bicycle seats as an option. I have to keep the sit down pressures off of the veins in my upper thighs while I am seated.
customer_reviews.author: Old Mind

customer_reviews.title: ... what it is supposed to do and it is comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: This cushion does what it is supposed to do and it is comfortable and well made. In fact, I intend to order 2 more, one for my husband to use when he is driving and one to use as a cushion on a chair that caused sciatic pain before putting the cushion on it. I can sit on the chair comfortably now. My brother recommended this cushion to me and I recommend it to anyone who has back or leg pain while sitting and/or driving
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Must have for long drives!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cushion for a 1500 mile road trip i had knowing my car seat gets uncomfortable fast. I’m so happy I did. I drove for 13 hours straight the first day and honestly could have gone a couple more. Couldn’t believe that my bottom never got sore. I would recommend to anyone. I’ll update if for some reason it wears out fast but this thing is very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Wason

customer_reviews.title: Think I can keep the care after all....
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!!! Took care of the whole problem with the bucket seat in my Ford Fusion. Up a little higher (very good since the seats are way to low) and the cushion fills the hole at the back of the seat. The strap and the cover keeps it from sliding around. Great improvement for a bad back vs. a bucket seat. So my friend and I took another 200 mile trip using these super duper cushions. Guess what? NO BACK PAIN!!!! Big improvement over our first trip. GREAT cushions. Highly recommend.....I would add a happy face here if I knew how.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Helped long drive leg pain.
customer_reviews.text: I had an 2003 Ford F250 XLT, so cloth seats. They went hard after 150k miles and they're bucket seats. So the bar at the bottom. No adjustment except for the back. My legs,driving 2 hours to and from work, began to really really hurt and be sore at home. I ordered this, and though it took getting used to, helped my legs while sitting for so long and fixed my pain. Simple fix. Good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Corbin Karl

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product that is exactly as described on the website
customer_reviews.text: I've never written a review as this. The product is well made and is what the producer describes it to be. However, after using it for three days, I returned it because it didn't work for me. It will deliver the relief and support that many are needing and wanting, but the comfort of entering and exiting the driver's seat was awkward and cumbersome for me. Sorry it didn't work!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Bought A Second One!
customer_reviews.text: Love the seat cushion. We have two in the house. The quality of fabrics are impressively good. The tail bone placement is accurate and comfortable. The securing strap is long enough to reach around my truck seats, and is adjustable for a snug fit. Keep in mind this is three inches thick towards the rear of cushion, so it will lift you higher in your car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Dryan

customer_reviews.title: Cushion is not comfortable, too firm
customer_reviews.text: Okay below is my original review. And the seller actually did send me an email telling me i can return. Thanksfully i didn’t not see this message. The wedge is very high and will make you sit way too high. However i took the case off and it’s wonderful. I now recommend:) Preview review: Do not purchase. Cushion is not comfortable, too firm. Boosts yourself way too high. I almost hit the ceiling of my car. They wouldn’t allow me to return product. As a matter of fact, they didn’t even reply to my message.
customer_reviews.author: nicole 29

customer_reviews.title: ... my wife and she loves it _ comfy and easy to remove when I drive
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife and she loves it _ comfy and easy to remove when I drive . Would recommend it as others I'd researched left stains on the cars seats _ this one was recommended and it's not sticking to the leather seats _ Good BUY !
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Has helped big time with long drives
customer_reviews.text: For the past few months, I've been feeling weakness in my upper legs along with some nerve irritation when driving long lengths, typically starting about 90 mins or 2 hours into a drive. I tried my current seat cushion that I use when I work from home, but was too uncomfortable, too high, and didnt help much. This cushion was a huge help on recent longer trips including several 3 hour drives and a 6 hour drive with a break in between. In fact, a few days after coming back from the 6 hour drive, when I forgot the cushion at home on a 2 hour trip, I started feeling the same issues pop up.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Tomopoulos

customer_reviews.title: This car cushion proved worthless.
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to raise my position in the car and to help me get out of the car easier. It was not worth a thing. It didn't help me at all. It was supposed to raise the seat about 3" but the cushion was very squishy and as soon as I sat down on it, it didn't help because I just sank lower in the seat. I feel like I just threw my money out. It's a total waste. money.
customer_reviews.author: hudis

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I can honestly say this thing greatly exceeded my expectations. Bought it to use on a long (18+ hour) drive, and not only did it prevent back pain and stiffness, it actually made my back feel better. I've only had it for a week or so, so I don't know how it'll hold up long term - but it's performance on that trip alone made it worth the price. Highly recommend to anyone with back issue. I have two herniated discs, and this thing really helped.
customer_reviews.author: Josh E.

customer_reviews.title: Seat cushion is a perfect addition to your driving comfort !!!
customer_reviews.text: This cushion gives you that added comfort and height needed when driving when you have the problem of sitting at the proper height for driving ! whether for short rides or long trips , this cushion gives that much added comfort you're looking for ! Oh yes it is a virtual God send for your back comfort !!
customer_reviews.author: Steven  E. Tate

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money. Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: Complete junk. Don't waste your money or time. Product is uncomfortable and offers ZERO relief. I suspect that most reviews are "sponsored" ads. ALSO: Customer service is awful and deceitful. Be careful.
customer_reviews.author: Tridacna

customer_reviews.title: ... as a game warden and have to drive a great distance somethings
customer_reviews.text: I drive a F-150 truck as a game warden and have to drive a great distance somethings. The truck was starting to put my leg to sleep with my duty belt. 200lbs at 6'0". I have used the pad for about 2 months now in the dead of a very humid summer. It can be a little warm and it raises you off the seat a little much for my liking especially since I am already in a truck. My duty gear sometimes snags on it as well. Other than that no more leg pain and slightly reduced back pain.
customer_reviews.author: pamela haskins

customer_reviews.title: Just ok - well made but not firm enough for my ride.
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I expected but it is satisfactory. I would prefer more support than it provides - its not a firm support but rather a cushiony sort of seat. For time being in a rental car its just ok. I wont repurchase and will probably leave it with the car when I return it.
customer_reviews.author: Lady in Blue

customer_reviews.title: 3000-mile road trip
customer_reviews.text: We just took a 3000-mile road trip. My wife enjoyed using it. While our Volkswagen Jetta has wonderfully adjustable seats it gives her just the additional height she needs, being only 4'10" tall. The strap is an excellent feature for holding the cushion in position. However since we swap back and forth between being driver and passenger we elected to remove the strap. I believe that the multiple densities of foam inside and the breathable cover make this a superior product. Very satisfied...
customer_reviews.author: Rich H

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT support you properly to help your alignment while driving
customer_reviews.text: This wedge was a little bit helpful in raising me to help with hip/lower back issues, but because it's not that supportive, it ended exacerbating my hip imbalance, causing longer term problems. I showed it to my physical therapist who said it's much too soft to really be helpful. Hope this review helps save someone else some money!
customer_reviews.author: Bicoastaler

customer_reviews.title: It does not disappoint. I will be purchasing another one for another ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item to give me a boost in my new vehicle. I made my choice based on reviews. It does not disappoint. I will be purchasing another one for another vehicle as I like it very much. Don't hesitate. It's a very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: L. McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Un-buckets the miserable bucket seat
customer_reviews.text: I am 4 ft. 11". This has been the best cushion that I have found so far — for comfortably lifting me out of the bucket pit in my car seat. Together with the power seat in my 2017 Subaru, my driving visibility is much improved. And the cushion doesn't interfere with fastening my seat belt.
customer_reviews.author: D M M

customer_reviews.title: Product has changed for the worse
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these, one from 2015 and one from 2018, and I hit the reorder button only to find the design in 2019 has changed for the worse. The new design is not nearly as firm, and has a ridge down the middle for some reason, which the old version did not. I use the cushion because it helps take pressure of my L5-S1 disc, and keeps me from losing feeling in my legs. The new design does not work like the old one did.
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Did what I wanted it to, but a little narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it for a long drive, but while still suffering from Protate Surgery, it gave me a little relief. You sit a bit higher in the seat, but I had adjustable seats and it wasn't that high that a mirror adjust could fix. My thighs were right on the outer edges. I would like to all in the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Hollis

customer_reviews.title: Durable, great as a car seat. [update]
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a year ago after a pretty horrible back injury, mostly for height while driving or riding in a car. I find myself taking this everywhere; it not only provides a couple of inches' worth of lift to my now-shorter frame, it's very comfortable. The material is very durable. If I lost this one I'd buy another in a heartbeat. I just bought a replacement a few weeks ago. Not because the 3-year-old cushion has worn out--it's held up remarkably well and still has plenty of firmness. But because we have a couple cars in our fleet and I got tired of running back and forth to grab my cushion. THAT's how good it it.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk

customer_reviews.title: It works, it's comfortable, it stays in place, it doesn't get hot or sticky
customer_reviews.text: I am tall, but with a short torso. My car seat had me slumped low behind the steering wheel, as if I was in a pool-side lounge chair. My back was forced into a C-curve. With this car seat, I am now sitting higher, with my back straight. This is less tiring and actually energizing to have my back straight. I like that the strap keeps it in place and it does not slide around. I just installed it and no further adjustments were necessary. I wish I had bought one of these years ago.
customer_reviews.author: LindaR

customer_reviews.title: Too hard and too thick
customer_reviews.text: These are well built but too hard. I bought them to use for driving long trips to make the car seat softer. This was too hard to sit on and did not provide any more cushion than my hard car seats. I would not recommend getting them. Also they raised me too high in the seat even with the car seat at it's lowest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Seaside

customer_reviews.title: ... is well made and has helped me sit more comfortably in the seat when I drive
customer_reviews.text: This car seat cushion is well made and has helped me sit more comfortably in the seat when I drive. It is very helpful on long distance drives as pressure is releaved on my spine. I also love the fact that it is strapped to the seat so it does not move or shift. Overall a very good product. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anoushig

customer_reviews.title: Quality of the material is good, well built but needs some refinements to make ...
customer_reviews.text: I received this car seat cushion and thought it would help me in my daily 2 hour commute. It does help the tail bone, but the cushion itself could be longer and wider to fit the entire seat so that you don't have the edges of the seat digging into your thighs and back of your legs. Quality of the material is good, well built but needs some refinements to make it more comfortable. thanks Jon
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Good Support
customer_reviews.text: I am a short and me trying to sit upright to see over the steering wheel really caused some major pain in my lower back, I almost didn't wan to drive anymore. But after using this product, my back pain was gone (what a relief!) and it gave me enough lift so I can see over the steering while. I also like how it comes with strap so it can stay in place as I enter and exit my car.
customer_reviews.author: M.C

customer_reviews.title: Great for added height
customer_reviews.text: I am barely 5'5 and my car has deep racing style bucket seats (RECARO's for anybody who may have the same issue). This gives me just the right amount of boost to be able to see well over the dash. I have been it using for several months now and couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn

customer_reviews.title: a must have for professional drivers
customer_reviews.text: If you're a truck / taxi driver, you need to understand that sitting does more damage than to your spine than standing. I have been out of work for a month due to a bulging disk that was pinching my sciatic nerve. Having this wedge and not having this wedge on the seat of my truck makes a big difference in my sciatic nerve pain. The material seems to be decent quality, but it's a bit small and I'm not a big person. So if you're on a larger tip of the scale, you may need to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: K. Choe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 5'1" wife, needed a comfortable booster seat for car and this absolutely does the trick. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Guggi

customer_reviews.title: I love my car again!
customer_reviews.text: I am now excited to commute to work. I was worried the tailbone cut out wouldn't be deep enough, but it is. I was also worried that the cushion would sink too much, but it's very supportive. I love sitting comfortably in my car, and I don't have to shift at every stop to get comfortable like I used to. The material is durable and it doesn't shift on my cloth seats. The placement was easy and only took a few minutes. It comes with a carrying bag, which was nice because it was raining when I brought it to my car.
customer_reviews.author: Zappy

customer_reviews.title: The seat cushion works just as described. I can ...
customer_reviews.text: The seat cushion works just as described. I can sit for hours in my other Nissan Z without any problems, but I find the seats in my Corolla cause my butt to hurt after only 20 minutes and cause me to constantly have to re-position myself in the seat. With this in my Corolla, I can sit for a long time without my butt hurting. The only drawback is that it's more expensive than the other cushions out there.
customer_reviews.author: LA Customer

customer_reviews.title: Own 2 of these, durable and fit just right
customer_reviews.text: This car seat cushion works perfectly. So many of these cushions make you feel like you are sitting on a high chair with your feet dangling, this one does not at all. It gives support and fits perfect with a bucket car seat. This is my second time purchasing it, the last one lasted almost 2 years. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: isabella

customer_reviews.title: Too firm for driving for several hours.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my refund date with Amazon expired while I was evaluating this cushion on a road trip. I tried hard to find the right position for this cushion using various car seat settings. Nothing worked for me. My car seat lumbar support was out of position because I was raised higher by the cushion than the designers anticipated. This cushion is very firm and may work for others but I found it painful after just a couple hours' driving.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Dodge

customer_reviews.title: I can see over my steering wheel!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a short driver like me. With my seat at the highest point, I can't see over my side mirror, so I can't see what's on my left easily at a stop sign. And I can't see over my steering wheel. This solves the problem, and is comfortable, too. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zenpup

customer_reviews.title: ... on my tailbone and make the car seat more comfortable. However
customer_reviews.text: This cushion definitely relieves the pressure on my tailbone and make the car seat more comfortable. However, it raises you a full 3 inches, which is quite a lot in a car. It took a while to adjust to being so much higher up, and it's a little uncomfortable. I have to duck much more when putting down the visor, and I'm a short person. If you're much taller than me and you're not in a truck, you might skim your head on the ceiling.
customer_reviews.author: Tamar

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME CUSHION
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year now and it has held up well. I bought it as a "booster" for the driver's seat. It's comfortable and easy to move if needed. It has a strap that secures around the back of the driver's seat so it doesn't move around (this feature is super helpful). I'm short (4'11") so I needed this to help me see better over the dashboard. My boyfriend (6'2") got this cushion too for his car and he likes it for the support it gives his back. Overall we are 2 happy customers with this seat cushion.
customer_reviews.author: maggienoodle

customer_reviews.title: Get this one!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my Honda Fit's notoriously uncomfortable car seat. Firm but not too and easily secured with the strap & Fastex buckle. Now that my knees are even with my hips, I don't limp away from the car anymore. Lots of not helpful cushions out there - this one is a winner. It's definitely pricier than most and completely worth the extra bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Artemis

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, well made product!!!
customer_reviews.text: It has helped the pain in my leg, hip and back while driving. I'm having issues getting used to sitting higher but the pain relief is worth it! Lovely, well made product!!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: MCalderini

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: With bursitis pain in my hip, and sitting over 45 minutes would make my pain unbearable, limiting my travel. I used a donut before this but constantly had to adjust it due to not having anything to make it adhere to the seat. I saw this product and even though it was more than I wanted to spent, it was such an investment. Now my pain is almost nonexistent since sitting without it no longer flares up my pain and it is as good as I bought it 6 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Greenlee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent well made and sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: As a professional driver, I must drive the vehicle I am assigned and some have virtually no seat adjustments especially tilting the seat. I have been using this seat to compensate for that. I have found that my knees get very sore if I sit for hours with the seat at a bad tilt angle. This pillow helps compensate for that and my knees feel much better, The seat is sturdy, well made and breaths well.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit for me
customer_reviews.text: The good news is that this cushion provided much needed relief for my hip and tailbone discomfort. The not so good news is that due to the 3 inch rise, I was no longer positioned to have sufficient lumbar support which moved the discomfort to my back. Despite trying all seat adjustment options I was unable to find a comfortable position using this cushion so unfortunately, I decided to return it.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: WELL MADE CUSHION THAT MET MY NEEDS.
customer_reviews.text: THIS CUSHION MET MY NEEDS OF FILLING IN THE BACK OF THE SEAT WITH A WEDGE SO I SIT WITHOUT SLOUCHING. IT IS A COMFORTABLE SITTING SURACE NOT TOO SOFT OR HARD. IT ALLOWS AIR TO CIRCULATE THROUGH IT. THE STRAP HELPS TO KEEP IT IN PLACE.
customer_reviews.author: Wintery

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: The cushion arrived quickly and in listed condition. I needed it for my new truck to lift me up some and for support. It is firm and supportive and I'm sure will last a long time. The last one I bought lasted a month before it was flat as pancake. This will not happen with this one I'm sure.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Solved sciatica issues!
customer_reviews.text: I bought and returned three other cushions before discovering this one. I was having constant issues with sciatica from the poorly designed seats in my car. I kept trying cushions that went behind my back, and everything just made it worse. The combination of a little bit of lift plus the space at the tailbone section of the cushion solved the problem, Finally!
customer_reviews.author: Gillian P.

customer_reviews.title: Can't drive without it.
customer_reviews.text: Had back surgery 10 years ago and have never felt comfortable sitting ever since. However, I can finally tolerate longer car rides and flights using this cushion. I've tried many different wedges and this one is the best all around. Sometimes I wish it was a bit thicker or a little more firm because it does loose thickness after lots of use but that is to be expected. I just buy another one for the car and put the older one in another location where I need to sit.
customer_reviews.author: Church St.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at last
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few cushions trying to find something to relieve my back problems while driving. So far this has helped the most. My back problems are never made worse after a long drive anymore. The cushion doesn't fit perfectly into my car seat, it adds a little too much height for me, and I don't like the color, but it serves its purpose exceptionally well. Not quite perfect, but I would buy it again and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: MellowManic

customer_reviews.title: Adequate but needs to be wider.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for lower back and hip pain. It helps however it is too narrow and needs a means to secure the front side of the cushion to the car seat. The cushion would be more comfortable if it were 2”-3” wider. I have a medium build/32” waist and this is narrow for me
customer_reviews.author: Nauset17

customer_reviews.title: I Can See Now When Driving!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfy cushion that is supportive! I purchased it to use as a truck seat riser in my Toyota Tacoma so I could see over dashboard and nose of the truck. It is made of durable material and the strap/buckle combo holds the pad nicely in place in the seat with zero slippage. It has a 2 inch rise in the back. The cover is removable too for cleaning. The cushion comes in a very nice nylon bag. I had to return another wedged cushion because it sat me too high in the seat at 3 inches. So. this was a great compromise!
customer_reviews.author: YotaGirl

customer_reviews.title: Not long enough.
customer_reviews.text: This would get 5 stars if it weren’t so sort from front to back. It’s quite firm, so while it does raise your backside up past the ridiculous wings that are on new cars, it then hits you uncomfortably across the back of the middle of your legs. Maybe if you’re super skinny (I am decidedly not) or insensitive to such things (I definitely am), then it would be great. Now I’m thinking maybe a whole sets cover with a layer of memory foam over this cushion might work. Kind of wishing I didn’t trade in my 2008 Prius for a 2018 Prius Prime.
customer_reviews.author: DelawareEarper

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is so comfortable and definitely does the job in leveling your car seat for better back support. The center curve our makes it even more comfortable for your tailbone! And the adjustable black strap that goes around the back of the seat holds the seat in place beautifully so there's no worries about ever having to rearrange the cushion on your car seat...very CLEVER!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Rotramel

customer_reviews.title: Like has to have pedal extensions
customer_reviews.text: One of the drivers in our house is short. Like has to have pedal extensions. This little cushion works great to get sitting a little taller to see over the dash. The wedge shape helps make up for the way a lot of car seats slope lower towards the rear of the seat. The foam is a good density to work as a mini booster seat. The retainer straps helps ensure the cushion stay positioned, but is fairly easy to remove for other drivers (easier than the pedal extensions!)
customer_reviews.author: Andy T. Knote

customer_reviews.title: Too small and hard
customer_reviews.text: The product dimensions said 22” x 16” x 2”. Not true. The cushion barely covered the small center strip of my Camry. I am not s large person, but I hung off both sides of the seat by a couple of inches. Since the cushion is hard, it created uncomfortable pressure where the cushion ended. I would not recommend this and have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Musica1

customer_reviews.title: Very delighted to find this custion.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat cushion for my 1998 Grand Marquis. It never got there. I tried it out on my chair with wheels & it is still there. The chair has flat bungee strips & I thought (& friends too) was the ultimate in comfort. I am ordering 2 more, one for the car & the other for my other bungee chair. The design is perfect for one's spine.
customer_reviews.author: Dog lover

customer_reviews.title: Change the Course of Your Day
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sitting/driving modification!! I have significant lumbar chronic pain, along with sacroiliitis which seriously limits my ability to sit or stand for even a short period of time. This cushion has changed my life. Of course no single item can correct chronic pain, but this cushion has brought me as close to normal as I could hope for. For anyone that deals with back pain, you know that 'any' improvement can change the course of your day. We now have one in each car and also in each dining chair. Great product!!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Buster

product_meta.title: Car Seat Booster Cushion with Strap - Extra Firm for Added Height, Thick 2 Inch Foam Auto Wedge, Coccyx Support for Back, For Drivers, Office Chairs, Wheelchairs, Breathable, Washable Cover
product_meta.description:
Do long car rides leave you hurting? Not anymore! Combining ergonomic design with our “Clever” foam, this slim wedge provides comfortable lumbar support to make every ride more enjoyable.

Does sitting in your car or truck for long periods cause you to suffer nagging back pain? Enjoy spending time in your vehicle again with the Clever Yellow Driving Comfort Cushion! Combining ergonomic design with our Clever foam, this slim wedge provides firm lumbar support to make every automative ride more enjoyable.

 Our premium orthopedic wedge tilts your pelvis just the right amount, for better posture and reduced pressure on the pain producing structures in your back during travel. It even has a cutout for your coccyx; your tailbone will thank you. Ventilated mesh cover fabric keeps your body cool and will not overheat (even when left exposed to the sun).
feature_bullets: NO MORE ACHING BACK - U-shaped portable orthopedic wedge tilts pelvis to improve posture and relieve pressure on lower spine during long automotive rides and in wheelchairs and other chairs. Ergonomic coccyx cut-out reduces tailbone pain and sciatica during travel.

VERY FIRM NO-FLATTEN DESIGN - Made from ventilated, breathable mesh material with a molded Clever foam core, it will not lose its shape like other brands. NOTE: the car seat cushion is deliberately very firm, and many people find it firmer than expected. The car seat cushion will arrive folded but will flatten out with first use. Many people find it firmer than expected

EXTRA SUPPORTIVE - Our cushion effectively raises your car seat height, particularly at the back, thus providing the perfect amount of lumbar support whilst making your seat flat. Your best auto booster pad. Removable gray cover is hand washable.

STAYS IN PLACE - Adjustable strap (maximum length 55 inches) with buckle goes around the back of car or truck seat to keep cushion stable and secure. NOTE: please be sure to tighten strap to avoid cushion sliding around on larger seats. Comes with a handy carry bag for easy portability.

JUST THE RIGHT WIDTH - Delivers ample support. Narrow enough to fit into the center of most car seats without buckling or bunching. For sizes please see picture. NOTE: initially the car cushion may have a strong smell due to transportation, but this will dissipate after 24 hours.
